Welcome to "BallSort" a 3D  game developed and operated by yt-Studio ("we," "us," or "our"). We are committed to respecting your privacy and protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share information when you use our application ("BallSort") on Meta Quest.

1. Information We Collect
Information You Provide Directly  
BallSort does not require user registration, and therefore we do not collect personal information such as your name or email address directly from you.

Device and Usage Information  
We may collect information related to your use of the app and your device, such as the device model, operating system version, and connection status. This data is used to optimize game performance and address technical issues.

Gameplay Data  
We do not collect gameplay data that can identify you personally (e.g., scores, playtime, or interaction history). However, if you use the leaderboard feature provided by the Meta platform, score-related information may be processed by Meta.

2. How We Use Your Information
We use the collected information for the following purposes:  
To provide, maintain, and improve BallSort (e.g., fixing bugs or enhancing performance).  

To respond to user support requests and resolve technical issues.  

To send you important notifications about the app (e.g., updates or policy changes).

3. Sharing Your Personal Information
No Sale to Third Parties: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.  

Service Providers: We may share minimal information with service providers (e.g., cloud server providers) necessary to support the operation of BallSort, but only for the purpose of delivering app functionality.  

Meta Platform: If you use the leaderboard feature, score data is managed by the Meta platform. We do not directly store this data.

4. Security of Your Information
We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, please note that no data transmission over the internet can be guaranteed to be completely secure.

5. Your Rights and Choices
Access and Deletion: Since BallSort collects minimal personal information, requests for access or deletion typically do not apply. However, feel free to contact us with any concerns.  

Withdrawal of Consent: You may withdraw consent at any time by adjusting settings within the app or contacting us.  

Leaderboard Opt-Out: You can avoid sharing score data by choosing not to use the leaderboard feature.

6. Children’s Privacy
BallSort is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have unintentionally collected information from a child, please contact us immediately, and we will take prompt action to address the situation.

7. Changes to This Privacy Policy
We may update this Privacy Policy as needed. Any changes will be reflected on this page with a new effective date. We recommend reviewing this policy periodically for updates.

8. Contact Us
If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please reach out to us at:  

Email: yuki22683@gmail.com

By using BallSort, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy. We appreciate your trust and are dedicated to delivering a fun and secure 3D BallSort experience.
Thank you for playing  BallSort!
